casebody.data:
MARTIN
v.
STATE of NC, et al. 210P16-4 Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 27, 2019

Michael T. Wood, Special Deputy Attorney General, Daniel P. O'Brien, Special Deputy Attorney General, James R. O'Neill, District Attorney, For State of North Carolina

Dale P. Martin, For Martin, Dale Patrick

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 25th of January 2019 by Petitioner for Notice of Appeal:

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference, this the 27th of March 2019."
